title: Project-Based Learning in Liberal Arts and Engineering Studies
description: Examination of how to define LAES as a new field of study; analysis of the creative process and team building in theory and in application. Researching, writing, revising and presenting a technical proposal suitable for submission to a national design competition seeking innovative solutions to complex technological/social problems. 2 seminars, 2 activities.
prerequisites: MATH 241; PHYS 132, PHYS 133; GE Area A
